channel.title: VBS on Muddy Creek Baptist Church
channel.description: Recent content in VBS on Muddy Creek Baptist Church

item.title: VBS 2023
item.description: This year MCBC will be doing Keepers of the Kingdom VBS from Answers in Genesis. Dates: June 19th–23rd Time: 6:30pm–8:30pm We’ll have a family night dinner on Friday the 23rd. Bring mom and dad and enjoy food, fun, and games. Click here to learn more about Keepers of the Kingdom VBS.
